text: Luis Francisco Romo Barrón (born 5 June 1995) is a Mexican professional footballer who plays as a defender and defensive midfielder for Liga MX club Cruz Azul. ==Club career== ==International career== He made his debut for Mexico national football team on 19 November 2019 in a CONCACAF Nations League game against Bermuda. ==References== ==External links== * *Luis Romo at Official Liga MX Profile *Luis Romo at Flashscore * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Mexican footballers Category:Mexico international footballers Category:Querétaro F.C. footballers Category:Liga MX players Category:Footballers from Sinaloa Category:People from Ahome Municipality
title: Luis Romo
